search_engine.crawler

Class WebCrawlerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • search_engine.crawler.WebCrawler
        • search_engine.crawler.WebCrawlerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class WebCrawlerThread
extends WebCrawler
    This is a single web crawler thread that will crawl a single domain for its responsiveness, plus retrieve all the domains in the response's content and send more crawlers in if possible (if the domain is unvisited and the max depth is not yet reached)
    Author:
    Nguyen Trung Hieu (A0088498)

      • run

        public void run()
        Called when the thread is started Check the depth: if reach maximum depth then quit Else try load the starting url and report
        Specified by:

      • LoadPageAndGetResponseTime

        private long LoadPageAndGetResponseTime(String link)
        Try to load the page and store all the page content inside the pageContent field At the same time measure the time taken to load the full page
        Parameters:
        link: - the url link of the page
        Returns:
        the time taken to load the full page. INVALID_NUMBER is returned if an error occured
